DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to evaluate and compare, clinically and radiographically,the effects of MEDCEM PC and MTA when used as pulp dressings following pulpotomy in human primary molars.
DOC.brief_title: MEDCEM PC and MTA in Pulpotomies of Primary Molars
DOC.criteria: healthy children molars showing: symptomless exposure of vital pulp by caries no clinical or radiographic evidence of pulp degeneration (excessive bleeding from the root canal, internal root resorption, interradicular and/or furcal bone destruction) the possibility of proper restoration of the teeth no physiological resorption of more than onethird of the root presence of systemic pathology history of allergic reaction to latex, local anaesthetics or to the constituents of the test pulp dressing agents
